Entries.Yri: I'm not one to enjoy festivals, but Robin invited me along...$s#$b#But... honestly, now I'm glad I didn't skip it.$h
Entries.Yri_y2: Nice to see you joined the festivities again. It actually isn't that bad to take a break every once in a while, right?
Entries.Charles: Robin invited Yri. I just tagged along.
Entries.Charles_y2: I didn't even know you could do so much with eggs.

Entries.Yri: Those dresses are so lovely. Maybe I should get one too. What do you think, dear?$h
Entries.Charles: You look lovely the way you are, but if you want we can buy one for next year.$h
Entries.Charles_y2: You're stunning. Would you do me the honor of being my dance partner?

Entries.Yri: I put in some coconut milk my mother shipped to me. Fresh from the Fern Isles!
Entries.Yri_y2: Yep. Coconut milk again. Well at least I know it's going to be good.$h
Entries.Charles: I hope no one plays any pranks.#$b#I'm not a fan of wasting food.$s
Entries.Charles_y2: What are you going to add this year, @?

Entries.Yri: I love the moonlight jellies... they're so beautiful.$h#$b#I wish I could see them every night. What do you think, honey?$h
Entries.Yri_y2: Charles, can we go closer to the water? I want a better look at the jellies.
Entries.Charles: The jellies are beautiful, but not as beautiful as you, dear.$h
Entries.Charles_y2: Yri, please stop moving so much. You're going to fall.

Entries.Yri: Have you seen Robin's woodwork? She's amazing, isn't she?$h
Entries.Yri_y2: Have you seen Charles? He said he'll be here soon.
Entries.Charles: Come on.... I just need one more win for the giant plushy.
Entries.Charles_y2: YES! Another win! Gimme the pink bear!

Entries.Yri: The food is divine, you need to try it out!$h
Entries.Yri_y2: I helped build the maze, so I've already finished it. Wait... where's Charles?
Entries.Charles_y2: I can't believe she left me here again. How do I get out of here?$s

Entries.Yri: It's so cold... I think I'll never get used to this season.$s
Entries.Yri_y2: I forgot the carrot at home!$u
Entries.Charles: I told you to dress warmer. Do you need some gloves, honey?$h
Entries.Charles_y2: Maybe we can use something else as a nose?

Entries.Yri: I hope Robin enjoys her present. I can't wait to see her open it.$h
Entries.Charles: I got Clint as my secret friend. I hope he likes his gift.
Entries.Charles_y2: Are you serious? You're the best!$h
